name: You'll Fail
description:
You'll Fail

You are that little, unimportant black square at the bottom of a screen. The only remotely interesting thing about it, to you at least, is that you control the direction of gravity in the game and you can watch your little square move. 

I guarantee your little square will die over and over again, but with enough patience and hopefully skill your little square will progress deeper and deeper until it reaches the mystified level 100, of which no-one has returned...

Good luck to all who attempt this challenge!

Controls:

ASWD (Or arrow keys): Left, up, down, right

Note: The keys do not control the player, they control the gravity of the game, so movement is not instantaneous.
